scripts.wait: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"))' --no-warnings scripts/wait-for-program.ts
scripts.test: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"))' --no-warnings node_modules/.bin/mocha -t 1000000 tests/**/*.mts
